snippet.title: Aquaman 2 Mera - Should Amber Heard be Fired?
snippet.description:
Aquaman 2 Amber Heard today! Beyond The Trailer's reaction & breakdown! With the audio tape confession re Johnny Depp, should Amber Heard be fired aka recast as Mera in the DCEU?
SUBSCRIBE: http://bit.ly/subscribeBTT

Aquaman 2 Amber Heard today! Beyond The Trailer host Grace Randolph's reaction & breakdown of the controversy over her and Johnny Depp, with #JusticeForJohnny and the leaked audio tape confession.  Should Amber Heard be fired by Warner Bros?  Should Mera be re-cast, or bring in Dolphin or Siren?  Share your own reaction to this controversy over Amber Heard in Aquaman 2 before you see the full movie in 2022! And be sure to make Beyond The Trailer your first stop for movie and entertainment news here on YouTube today!

https://bit.ly/2RJUJwD
